imgtag-desc: A short description of this extension
imgtag-error-no-src: Error message shown when the src attribute of the image is not set
imgtag-error-invalid-src: Generic error message shown when the src attribute is invalid
imgtag-error-invalid-protocol: Error message shown when the src attribute contains an invalid protocol
imgtag-error-invalid-domain: Error message shown when the src attribute belongs to a disallowed domain
